name: pnp-list-formatting-percent-chart-format
title: Percent Chart format
shortDescription: This sample display formatted percent chart row based on icon/emoji/svg and associated result number, used is able to manage to total and used items for percent calculation.
longDescription: This sample display formatted percent chart row based on icon/emoji/svg and associated result number, used is able to manage to total and used items for percent calculation.

metadata.value: ms-fontColor-themePrimary, ms-fontColor-neutralTertiary, ms-fontWeight-bold, ms-fontSize-68, ms-fontSize-32, ms-fontSize-16, ms-fontSize-14, ms-fontSize-42

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
